title: Thinking about it, Layka might be the one we hear sing "The Path to the Hearth-Home".

embed.description: Composer: Kyle "Kole" Hicks (http://www.kolemusician.com/) Lead Vocalist: Christine Hals (www.christinehals.com) In the echoes of the mountains and the crackling of the embers, a legend once forgotten is remembered with a song older than any tribe. Ornn, The Mountainsmith will be soon returning. Sung in Ancient Frejlordian.

body:
It's pure speculation but it would make sense since she creates songs based on tales.
It could also be any woman from the Notai Tribe though.

EDIT: It seems like this is confirmed.
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/300601918009376778/479086124904742922/nunu_ornn_song.png

EDIT 2: Riot Talondor just confirmed it down there.

replies.body: Does that mean this is now canon? :3
Wait for Talondor to send you a note (A, B, C, D, E, F, G).
Loving the Newnu Slagle! Really happy you and Albers captured his lightheartedness
Is it possible the Notai are descendants of the Hearthblood? Because I had a theory that {{champion:79}} was actually a descendant of them for various reasons, but I'm guessing Nunu is as well?
They're different, expect to learn more soon!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} very impressive! Well done :)

Hmm... as far as a note; here's a few: E, A, G, D, C, D. Keep your ears open!

It's new Nunu (heheh) lore, actually. Layka's his mother, and told stories through songs.

So it's possible.

Well well well look what we have here

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/300601918009376778/479086124904742922/nunu_ornn_song.png

[Nunu & Willump Special Interactions - SkinSpotlights](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7KDMexe7W38)
Seems like I got it right.

> [{quoted}](name=Hextech OwI,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=lbQUfOj7,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2018-08-15T01:55:57.270+0000)
>
> Seems like I got it right.

Seems you did, solid work! Ornn would be proud, though he might not admit it.
Fantastic theory! I totally forgot that Ornn came out with a song, how embarassing! XD {{champion:516}}
